page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: {Cubs}and{Scouts}meet at the new Scout hut, near the Parish Hall on the A537 (between the Railway bridge and the road junction A535/537).This new hut,a permanent building, was built in about 1983. The old wooden hut,nearer the roundabout,was demolished and the land added to the village playing field. { { {Scouts}meet 7.30 - 9.45p.m. on Fridays. Green is the colour of their Neckerchief. Scouts play rough games called wide games. { {Cubs}meet on Wednesdays. There are four people in charge; three are helping and one is Mrs.Robinson who is Akala.For camp, cubs have a range of 100 miles out of their district. In June 1985 the cubs went out on a weekend holiday to Barnswood,near Rushton Spencer,Leek.
